resources.string: Bhopal Coders Community\n VIPs\n(Volunteer in Progress)

Bhopal Coders Community, is the backbone of the Tech Communities in Bhopal, such as Google Developers Group, Bhopal and Developer Circles from Facebook. Our efforts are aligned towards making Bhopal, a Technology Hub. We're looking for individuals enthusiastic about the Impact, Technology can bring.


Introducing our "Volunteer in Progress" (VIP) program. Sign up with your details, if you are interested about influencing people, and making more and more individuals excited about technology.


All the details must be correct. Incomplete forms will not be accepted.

 Forms with inappropriate answers will be rejected and would not be considered for submission.

 The shortlisted candidates would be called for Personal Interview.


For any queries, text us on WhatsApp:

 Sameer Khan: +918120266490
A copy of your responses will be emailed to the address you provided.
I agree to the terms and condition.
